biotools.summary: An integrated deep learning framework that uses sequence, domain and Gene Ontology information to predict PPIs of Arabidopsis thaliana. DeepAraPPI currently consists of three basic models: (i) a Siamese recurrent convolutional neural network (RCNN) model based on word2vec encoding, (ii) a multiple layer perceptron model based on Domain2vec encoding, and (iii) an multiple layer perceptron model based on GO2vec encoding. Finally, DeepAraPPI combines the results of three individual predictors using a logistic regression model.

bioschemas.name: DeepAraPPI
bioschemas.summary: An integrated deep learning framework that uses sequence, domain and Gene Ontology information to predict PPIs of Arabidopsis thaliana. DeepAraPPI currently consists of three basic models: (i) a Siamese recurrent convolutional neural network (RCNN) model based on word2vec encoding, (ii) a multiple layer perceptron model based on Domain2vec encoding, and (iii) an multiple layer perceptron model based on GO2vec encoding. Finally, DeepAraPPI combines the results of three individual predictors using a logistic regression model.
